main event: A UFO sighting was reported at Patrick AFB, Florida on August 31, 1954, involving one object that was tracked using radar.
interesting points: The object was described as having a flat, silver, disc-like appearance and exhibited irregular movement, The sighting lasted for 1 hour and 45 minutes, The observation included ground-radar tracking with a theodolite, The source of the report includes both civilian and military personnel, There were discussions in a newspaper article about possible weather balloons in the area during the time.
